title: Patch :(
body: Hi Rioters, I've been a proud Lag of Legend supporter/player since season 5, when I first started playing the patches were about 15 mins ( I lie 30 mins) but remember when the NA server shut down? that's when LoL patches started getting frustrating, it would always get stuck at 33%. My only choice was to re-install it. but now the patch's are way too big and take too much space for my PC too handle. I wish there was some way I could play on my Google chrome computer, but LoL doesent work on Google Chrome. Is there another way too play LoL? :(

replies.body: If you're consistently getting stuck at 33%, this usually means that there's a connection error that's preventing you from connecting (or you're disconnecting) from the patching servers.  Around 33% is when the patcher is actually attempting to download new content vs. scanning files.  I'd recommend checking out our [Connection Troubleshooting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) article and see if that helps alleviate your patching problems.  Let me know if it helps!
